Articles.Content:
A-Tech is now open for job applications. Our current need is for 1-3 engineers who's primary role will be to develop rovers, mini-rovers, landers and ground stations that are compatible with other A-Tech equipment.

If you'd like to join our team you may apply on this thread or via private message. When developing compatible craft, the A-Tech MST should be used for compatibility tests as it is mobile and has both the low & higher docking ports for testing any equipment.

Our current craft list can be found at:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/27806-Allister-Technology-Colonization-Project

I want, to join, i have to go to sleep now

Ill explain later, sorry
